subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN1805 is on the way
description_text:

good ETA?

conversations.body_text: Hi Marquise Bethea,     We do not have a separate clutch in our US warehouse and the estimated time of arrival is the 30th.

Ok, thank you.

On Wed, Jun 25, 2025 at 5:57 AM service@simsonn.com

Hello it’s the 2nd and I was told I would see it by the 30th . Now the
tracking is saying it doesn’t exist  . Please help  .

On Wed, Jun 25, 2025 at 9:48 AM Marquise Bethea <markeebethea@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Ok, thank you.
>
> On Wed, Jun 25, 2025 at 5:57 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Marquise Bethea,   You can use this link to track it, it has now gone through customs and is expected to arrive for you around the 7th. https://www.track718.us/en/detail?nums=JSEXN2400850428YQ

HELLOO PLEASE HELP MY PACKAGE DID NOT COME ! It says delivered but it is
not here !!!!!!

On Fri, Jul 4, 2025 at 10:46 AM service@simsonn.com
